title: RIOT I AM SICK AND TIRED OF THIS
body:
Riot i have received countless of low priority queue bans because YOUR client crashes, ive have lost well over 100 LP points because YOUR client crashes. I have spent hundreds and hundreds of dollars on skins, chest etc you name it. ive supported you many times over and i get this in return ? 
i want these 5 game 20 min queue bans removed and lp back this is unfair and not right. i dont care if im not supposed to tell you this way its the only way i can do it from what ive found on the websites.

replies.body:
Hey there,

* Is your client crashing or is the game crashing?
* Do you receive any error messages when you experience a crash?
* What are your system specs?
* Are you playing on a wired or wireless connection?
